page.title: 09Youth Clubs in Bletchley
page.content: A Youth Club is where teenagers go to enjoy themselves in the evening.At the one I go to the age group is from 10-16 years.The Youth Club is open on Wednesdays from 7-10 O'clock.It costs 30p to get in if it is a disco and if it is a games night it's 20p (that's only if you have got a membership card which costs 50p).Every three weeks there is a disco but the problem is that the boys don't like the disco because only the girls dance. On ordinary nights there are games put out to play like putting,snooker, darts,table football and table tennis. There is also a tuck shop which sells sweets and drink. The Youth Club is very popular and lots of teenagers enjoy it and go regularly.
